duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide project advisory execution leadership including root cause analysis, project set up, contract evaluation, estimates, technical evaluations, contractor work scope development, on-site construction progress audit, project status presentations review, OAC meetings support, change order and pay application administration, project schedule management, damages quantification, project QA/QC, mediation/litigation support, and project close out.
Lead Client Sr. Management communication and oversite of change order and pay application administration.
Prepare and/or review project status presentations and update reports, support monthly OAC meetings and lead Client Sr. Management communication.
Oversite of project schedule management processes, damages quantification, and execution of Project QA/QC processes.
Execution of Project QA/QC processes, project close out, mediation/litigation support as required.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Engineering or Construction Management or equivalent work experience
